files.patch:
@@ -413,3 +413,7 @@
-            /* We only want TrueType fonts for Java FX */
-            if (fontformat != NULL
-                && (strcmp((char*)fontformat, "TrueType") != 0)) {
+            /* We only want OpenType fonts for Java FX :
+             * ie TrueType and CFF format fonts.
+             */
+            if ((fontformat != NULL) &&
+                ((strcmp((char*)fontformat, "TrueType") != 0) &&
+                 (strcmp((char*)fontformat, "CFF") != 0)))
+            {
